name: user_nicknames
description: Manage user nicknames with a given action user ID, and server id from your system message.

action.name: action
action.description: The action to perform (add_nickname, get_nickname, or remove_nickname)

user_id.name: user_id
user_id.description: The user ID for which to manage the nickname

nickname.name: nickname
nickname.description: The nickname to assign (required for add_nickname action)

server_id.name: server_id
server_id.description: The ID of the server you're adding the nickname in
